data.message: Hello Facebook, we had a page with about 4 million likes, that is hijacked two days ago, we tried to report it to you. But, we are not getting any response. I know this is not the right place to say it, but we are really helpless to get our page back. Please, do something for us. It will be great if you tell us a source for direct contact with you, please. Thanks.

replies.message: Hey, Saif. If you believe your Page was hacked, please make sure to follow these instructions: http://bit.ly/2czFUNE. -Rhea

Thank you Rhea.

We have already tried that way u gave me. I can't say you here in public details, about what really happened. Three days almost gone, but we get no reply from Facebook. 

Will you please let me send you details about our page hijacking through e-mail or msg? We were using that page since four years. Please, help us to get our page back.

place unblock account facebook me
Thadepo9@gmail.com
I have just been hacked- why cant facebook have a real person to help- honestly the company is making enough money to do this small thing when their users are in distress
Hey there. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. -Hannah
